title: Swap in newly generated red-accent mascot across the site

requirements.summary: Add newly generated square transparent PNG mascot derived from the uploaded sketch with a subtle red accent as a static frontend asset.
acceptanceCriteria: A new PNG mascot asset exists in frontend/public/assets/generated with the exact filename specified in imageRequirements.required.
The mascot has a subtle red accent (not fully saturated, not dominant) and otherwise fits the existing grunge/sketch aesthetic.
The exported PNG has a transparent background and is visually centered with appropriate padding for use at small sizes (e.g., 40x40) without cropping.

file_operations.description: Add the generated square transparent PNG mascot asset derived from Untitled_Artwork.jpeg, preserving the hand-drawn style with a subtle red accent and centered padding for small-size usage.

requirements.summary: Replace existing mascot/logo images in HeroSection, TopNav, and FooterSection with the newly generated mascot asset and keep alt text English and brand-consistent.
acceptanceCriteria: frontend/src/components/sections/HeroSection.tsx uses the new mascot asset path in its .
frontend/src/components/nav/TopNav.tsx uses the new mascot asset path in its .
frontend/src/components/sections/FooterSection.tsx uses the new mascot asset path in its .
All updated mascot tags retain English alt text and do not introduce non-English UI text.

file_operations.description: Update the hero mascot to use /assets/generated/timepass-mascot-logo-upload-redhint.dim_512x512.png and adjust alt text to an English, brand-consistent value.
Update the TopNav mascot to use /assets/generated/timepass-mascot-logo-upload-redhint.dim_512x512.png and adjust alt text to an English, brand-consistent value.
Update the FooterSection mascot to use /assets/generated/timepass-mascot-logo-upload-redhint.dim_512x512.png and adjust alt text to an English, brand-consistent value.
